name: Darksiders II: Deathinitive Edition
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  appid: 388410
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition/Darksiders2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Installing Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition (GOG)
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
pulse_latency: false
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    dinput8: native,builtin
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
    xinput1_3: builtin
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
  xinput: true
